item.title: ‘Black Mirror: Into Infinity’ Used 669 VFX Shots; Space Battle Sequence Was Inspired by ‘Top Gun,’ ‘Star Wars’ and More
item.description: “Black Mirror” closed out Season 7 with a sequel to Season 4’s “USS Callister.” Titled “USS Callister: Into Infinity,” the epic episode featured hyperspace, a space battle and cloning with nods to cla
